P.HT: Template for notifying the intention to establish accepted market practices

CELL.HT: Proposed date of establishment of the AMP:
[insert the date on which the AMP is intended to be established by the notifying competent authority]

P.HT: [insert text, including the identification of the types of financial instrument and trading venues on which the AMP will be performed; the types of persons who can perform the AMP; the type of beneficiaries, and, the indication of whether the market practice can be performed for a determined period of time and of any situations or conditions leading to a temporary interruption, suspension or termination of the practice]
Rationale for which the practice could constitute market manipulation

CELL.HT: List of criteria taken into account
Conclusion of the competent authority and rationale

NP.TXT: Level of transparency provided to the market

CELL.HT: [insert text to fill in the rationale for this criterion]

NP.TXT: Degree of safeguards to the operation of market forces and the proper interplay of the forces of supply and demand.

CELL.HT: [insert text to fill in the rationale for this criterion]

NP.TXT: Impact on market liquidity and efficiency.

CELL.HT: [insert text to fill in the rationale for this criterion]

NP.TXT: The trading mechanism of the relevant market and the possibility for market participants to react properly and in a timely manner to the new market situation created by that practice.

CELL.HT: [insert text to fill in the rationale for this criterion]

NP.TXT: Risks for the integrity of, directly or indirectly, related markets, whether regulated or not, in the relevant financial instruments within the Union.

CELL.HT: [insert text to fill in the rationale for this criterion]

NP.TXT: Outcome of any investigation of the relevant market practice by any competent authority or other authority, in particular whether the relevant market practice infringed rules or regulations designed to prevent market abuse or codes of conduct, irrespective of whether — it concerns, directly or indirectly, — the relevant market or related markets within the Union.

CELL.HT: [insert text to fill in the rationale for this criterion]

NP.TXT: Structural characteristics of the relevant market, inter alia, whether it is regulated or not, the types of financial instruments traded and the type of market participants, including the extent of retail investors' participation in the relevant market.

CELL.HT: [insert text to fill in the rationale for this criterion]
